page.title: 05Customs & Ghost Stories 1
page.content: { At{ 68 Berrington Road}some people heard footsteps every night across the bedroom floor and it was very spooky. At{Church House}when you went to bed and you turned out the light you felt someone hitting you. One day some people were walking down the road and they saw a tall lady dressed in green.They passed her and she called out to them,they looked round and she was gone. During{the great flood}of Tenbury Miss Griffin went into the local Church and saw a ghost.She was watching the choir boys singing and asked Mr.Howard the organist to look behind him,and he saw a figure of a man gliding over the pews and he went right through the font and disappeared.
